long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing "Click Ashley" – a fun add-on that spices up your web browsing experience. With a 1 in 1000 chance, this extension surprises you with a classic Rick Ashley "Never Gonna Give You Up" video when you click on a link. Use this as a prank or simply keep it installed on your own computer to surprise yourself. Remember, every time you click a link, there is a 1 in 1000 chance of getting Rickrolled.
